notes.title: Author contributions
notes.p: M.T.O.M., V.V.C., M.M.T. and M.L.N. planned the studies. M.T.O.M., M.A.S., G.F.G., C.M.Q., T.P.M., C.D.S., F.M.S., V.F.Q., I.P. and J.H. conducted experiments. S.C.W. provided the live-attenuated MAYV vaccine. M.T.O.M., V.V.C., D.G.S., M.M.T. and M.L.N. interpreted the results. M.T.O.M., V.V.C., M.M.T. and M.L.N. wrote the first draft of the paper. V.V.C., M.M.T. and M.L.N. obtained funding. All authors reviewed, edited and approved the paper.
